Subject: EPP not working
Description:
Please, we are experiencing an issue with our endpoint. At the moment, it is not working, and I cannot access the admin panel. 
I believe the issue might be related to the VM, but I need you to check and confirm the problem.
What do you need to connect in our VM ?
What_We_Know__c:
5/23/2025
- Joined remote session
- Customer reported issue with VM containing EPP.
- Restarted VM
- Customer able to access the EPP console without issue
- Verified that customer created a snapshot
- Upgraded EPP Appliance version to EPP 5942
- Customer wishes to upgrade Ubuntu version from 18.04 to latest version
- Opened new ticket towards Migration and server upgrade : 00446163 - Migration and Server Upgrade
- Customer has given me permission to close case


5/19.2025

- Customer wishes to upgrade to the latest EPP version 5942.
- Scheduled upgrade on May 23rd at 2 PM CST

5/16/2025

- Sent customer follow up email 
4/24/2025

- Conducted an internal review to determine the Ubuntu version for the upcoming release on EPP Hosted Solution Channel.
- Engaged with the technical team for confirmation regarding the operating system.
- Sent customer email confirming that Ubuntu 22 will be included on the next VM appliance release.

4/23/2025

- Joined remote session
- Customer able to access the EPP UI without issue
- Verified disk space on system and EPP server both at 12G/88G respectively
- Verified the EPP version is at 5.9.4.0
- Customer inquired about a migration to latest version
- Monitoring agent in Azure displaying an issue, screen shot included
- Customer will wait until Ubuntu 24 to begin to upgrade at targeted date end of July 2025

* Will need to ask internally (Team Solutions Engineers Group): 

Could you confirm whether the upcoming appliance VM will be based on Ubuntu 24, or will it continue using Ubuntu 22?
Next_Steps__c: Closing case as per customer request
